Frequently Asked Questions

How does the free plan work?

The free plan includes everything you need to get started: unlimited menu items, basic dashboard, WhatsApp contact, and pickup orders. You can boost individual meals for AED 49 each when you want extra visibility.

What's included in the Growth plan?

Growth plan (AED 99/month) includes unlimited meal boosts, delivery platform links (Talabat, Deliveroo), advanced analytics, finance tracking, and priority WhatsApp support.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

How do I get started?

Simply sign up for free, add your menu items, and start receiving orders. Upgrading to Growth is optional and can be done anytime.

Ready to start growing your restaurant?

Join hundreds of restaurants already using GoSnel to reach more customers.
